info.title: Asset Cash Flow Projections API
info.description: Allow clients to upload scenario files through APIs.

202.description: Expected response, returns the Signed URL along with errors if any.

longRunningStatus.description: Link to use the uploadID returned in the response from POST and use it as input to the GET Status endpoint.

400.description: Bad Request.Please check schema and make sure the file doesn't have special characters

403.description: User is forbidden with current credentials

429.description: Rate limit reached. Wait till the time specified in Retry-After header value to make further requests.

500.description: Server error. Log the X-DataDirect-Request-Key header to assist in troubleshooting.

503.description: Request timed out. Retry the request in sometime.

ClientErrorResponse.description: The response schema for reporting errors

ClientScenariosUpload.description: Details required for uploading scenario files wrapped in a data object

ClientScenariosUploadParameters.description: Details required for uploading scenario files

asOfDate.description: Scenario As of Date ( Please select a Date not later than Previous Close Date) in YYYY-MM-DD format.

fileName.description: Scenario file name including file extension.

overwrite.description: Flag to indicate if existing file needs to be overwritten. Please expect a 409 if the file already exists and the overwrite is not set to true.

replaceSpecialCharacters.description:
Flag to indicate if the special characters in the fileName can be replaced with underscore. Please expect a 400 if their exists some special characters in the filename and this parameter is not set to true.
- `SpecialCharacters`: .^%~$!#{} ()'`+,:/

ClientUploadResponse.description: Gives details to upload the file wrapped in a data object

expirationTime.description: The signed URL remains valid for a duration of 4 hours and is usable until it becomes invalid or outdated.

signedUrl.description: Signed url to upload the scenarios file

asOfDate.description: As of Date should be in YYYY-MM-DD format.

scenarios.description: Scenarios - Actuarial Scenarios input requires extension whereas Fixed Income Scenario Editor Scenarios wont have any extension

asOfDate.description: As of Date should be in YYYY-MM-DD format.

UploadStatusResponse.description: Validation status of the uploaded file

acfpStatus.description:
The ACFP status of the uploaded file, can be one of the following:
- `pending`: File validation is pending.
- `validating`:File is being validated.
- `error`: File failed validation. 
- `replicating`: File is being copied.
- `good`: File is successfully validated.
- `preparing`: File is being parsed. 
- `uninitiated`: File upload is not initiated.

numberOfScenarios.description: Number of scenarios that are within a scenario file

status.description: The status of the uploaded file, can be one of the following:

uploadDateTime.description: The time stamp when the file is uploaded

X-FactSet-Api-Request-Key.description: Key to uniquely identify an Analytics API request. Only available after successful authentication.

X-FactSet-Api-RateLimit-Limit.description: Number of allowed requests for the time window.

X-FactSet-Api-RateLimit-Remaining.description: Number of requests left for the time window.

X-FactSet-Api-RateLimit-Reset.description: Number of seconds remaining till rate limit resets.

Retry-After.description: Time to wait in seconds before making a new request as the rate limit has reached.
